result.title: My friend wants new subject for R&E(Research and Education), plz recommend something.
result.content:
Hello codeforces!

We are in danger.

If we don't specify a subject for R&E by tomorrow,

We will be killed by codename 'cosby'

plz help us

We are considering 'artificial neural network' as our research.

But, We are not experts of this field.

If you have some good topics plz recommend.

Sincerely, kleenex
